post:
We have deployed a new KVM node with SSD cached setup in Dallas. 

 

Current Offers:

 

1) 50% recurring discount for all plans. (code WELCOME)

2) Double all your resources by paying annually for all plans. (Contact sales after ordering)

 

Node Specs :

 

[OpenVZ] Turkey, Radore : CPU : Xeon E31230 @ 3.20GHz | RAM : 32 GB | HDD : 2 x 4TB | Port : 1Gbps

 

[KVM] Dallas Texas, Incero : CPU : Xeon E5-2620 @ 2.10GHz | RAM : 128 GB | HDD : 2 x 240GB SSD + 4 x 4TB | Port 1Gbps

 

All plans include

• INSTANT SETUP!

• 24/7 Support

• No long term contracts

• SolusVM VPS Management Portal

• Unlimited Reboots/Reinstalls

• Fully Managed

• Root Access

• Raid Based Storage
